summary: This mod adds a raven-shaped rock formation above the town of Raven Rock in Solstheim.
descriptionHtml:
[center]﻿[font=Trebuchet MS][color=#9fc5e8][size=5]What this mod does
[/size][/color]
[size=3]The town of Raven Rock (Dragonborn DLC) now takes its name from a raven-shaped rock formation.
I created one by using regular rocks, to which I added the typical volcanic ash effect.

[/size][/font][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3]These are purely vanilla assets, so the appearance of the Raven will change
according to the rock retextures you may have installed.
[/size][/font][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3]
You can jump and hike and reach the top of the Raven's head, where you will find a ruby ore vein. 
The rock formation is also visible from any distance.

[youtube]fHa-7k83UBQ[/youtube]
[/size]
[color=#9fc5e8][size=5]Compatibility[/size]
[/color]
[size=3]This mod should be compatible with everything,
unless there's a mod that edits that particular spot on the mountain ridge.[/size]
[size=3]In this (I hope unlikely) case, please let me know! :) [/size]

[color=#9fc5e8][size=5]You can follow my mod projects here: [/size][/color][/font][color=#9fc5e8][size=5]
[/size][/color]
[size=4][font=Georgia][url=https://www.facebook.com/CreativeUndriel/][img]https://i.imgur.com/bSduLyY.png[/img][/url] [url=https://discord.gg/2SszBBp][img]https://i.imgur.com/tUc0JTE.png[/img][/url] [/font][/size][size=4][font=Georgia][url=https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCYdmczAtdNWv3JrvnenlBjw?][img]https://i.imgur.com/WrFlwMm.png[/img] [/url][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/users/40453140?tab=user+files][img]https://i.imgur.com/7refinl.png[/img][/url][/font][/size]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/VP84ep5.jpg[/img][/center]
author: Undriel
